channel.title: .NET on Brian Stadnicki
channel.description: Recent content in .NET on Brian Stadnicki

item.title: Failed to modify a data converter
item.description: An interesting Fiverr project I got recently is modifying the EXFO Toolbox data converter to allow excel files. This toolbox is used for fibre optic measurements. The client wants to be able to change a few values in the measurements which can’t be done using the tool. Overview It’s quite a simple part of the program, just select the 2 files to merge and tada. Issue is, it merges OLTS/OLTS2 files, not the excel file requested.
